channel.title: Need help adding comp cape or max cape stand and cape
channel.description: i need help adding max cape stand and cape@@

item.title: Need help adding comp cape or max cape stand and cape
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I assume you got PI?

Anyways get the models for the rack update put in ur objectdef.
Then spawn it somewhere ingame through objectmanager then click it.
In the cmd box it will say like actionbutton 3982.
Now you go into actionhandler and under the switch statement add something like this:

case 3982: c.getItems.addItem(####, 1); break;

= the code for ur comp cape. If u dont have comp cape yet I once released a lil snip for it and a base for the emote

Code sucks but its better then nuthin

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding comp cape or max cape stand and cape
